alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 4:13PM ChST until January 09 at 5:15PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...TaTuHa and northward on the island of Guam. * WHEN...Until 615 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 412 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.2 and 0.6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Mongmong- Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Asan, Piti and Santa Rita. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
